Package com.licel.jcardsim.remote

jCardSim remoting support classes.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BixVReaderProtocol  
    JavaCardRemoteInterface
    RMI Wrapper for the JavaCardInterface.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BixVReaderCard
    BixVReader Card Implementation.
    BixVReaderIPCProtocol
    Client protocol impl (BixVReader (IPC)).
    BixVReaderTCPProtocol  
    JavaCardRemoteClient
    RMI client.
    JavaCardRemoteServer
    RMI Server.
    SerializableAID
    Serializable AID container for the RMI calls.
    VSmartCard
    VSmartCard Card Implementation.
    VSmartCardReloader  
    VSmartCardTCPProtocol
    VSmartCard TCP protocol implementation.
